voxy_extra.config.fix_nether_fog.tooltip: Disables nether fog with environmental fog enabled.
voxy_extra.config.save_old_lods.tooltip: Enables copying LoDs to special folder (doesn't support combining replays). If turned off, LoD location will be written to metadata instead, which can't be ingested in the replay.
voxy_extra.config.flashback_ingest.toolt: Enables ingesting in compatible Flashback replays (which have LoD copied).
voxy_extra.config.server_blacklist.toolt: Allows blacklisting servers to disable Voxy in them. Add to server_blacklist_list in voxy-extra.json, format: ["IP", "IP2"].
voxy_extra.config.lod_mirror.tooltip: Allows setting one LoD storage for multiple IP addresses. Add to lod_mirror_list in voxy-extra.json, format: [["BaseIP", "AltIP", "AltIP"], ["BaseIP2", "AltIP2"]].
